The health check of the SQUAKE service executed successfully and indicates that the system is operational, but it doesn't contain relevant information regarding deletion of court records. It seems that this topic might not be within the jurisdiction of available functions tied to SQUAKE.

Given that the deletion of a court record isn't present in the available tools or queries I have access to, I cannot assist with this task.

Therefore, I will call the Finish function to denote that I am unable to handle it.
